verse: Sick, is he? Give him some medicine, boys

name: URUK HAI
verse: Can't take his draught

name: URUK HAI
verse: Why? You want some?

name: URUK HAI
verse: Then keep your mouth shut.

name: URUK HAI
verse: Man-flesh

name: URUK-HAI
verse: I'm starving. We ain't had nothing but maggoty bread for three stinking days.

name: WITCH KING
verse: Feast on his flesh.

name: WITCH KING
verse: Do not come between the Nazgl and his prey.

name: WITCH KING
verse: You fool!No man can kill me.Die now

name: WITCH KING
verse: Do you not know death when you see it, old man? This is my hour

name: WITCH KING
verse: Slay them all

name: WITCH KING
verse: I will break him.

name: WITCH KING
verse: You have failed! The world of men will fall

name: WITCH KING
verse: Send forth all legions. Do not stop the attack until the city is taken.
